# cloudflare_zero_trust_access_ai_controls_mcp_portals (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_zero_trust_access_ai_controls_mcp_portals" "example_zero_trust_access_ai_controls_mcp_portals" {
  account_id = "a86a8f5c339544d7bdc89926de14fb8c"
  search = "search"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `account_id` (String)

### Optional

- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `search` (String) Search by id, name, hostname

### Read-Only

- `result` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result))

- `hostname` (String)
- `id` (String) portal id
- `modified_at` (String)
- `modified_by` (String)
